BasicInfo.short: SkyGrid offers a platform that provides web-scale infrastructure to help people connect with things they are passionate about.

Products.name: SkyGrid Groups
Products.description: Groups is a first-of-its-kind social forum, connecting the conversations people are having all over the web about a topic, artist or brand
